title: Piece Together a Winning Investment With TILE
text:
In the right circumstances it pays to be boldThat occurs when logic tells you that potential reward far outweighs riskExactly that situation presented itself in late August with the shares of Interface, Inc(TILE) . Despite all-time record earnings and its highest dividend ever, TILE had been beaten down to a new multi-year lowOn Aug

description: With an extremely undervalued stock like Interface, Inc. during late August, there's a strong chance options can provide a good high risk, high return play.
